overview_of_class: Welcome to Elementary Russian. Elementary Russian 101-1 is the first part in a three-quarter sequence designed to introduce students to the Russian language and contemporary Russian culture. In this course, students will develop the fundamentals of speaking, listening, writing, and reading through a variety of communicative and content-based activities. Emphasis will be placed on practical communication so that students should be able to function in many authentic situations by the end of the quarter!
name: Elementary Russian
title: WCAS SLAVIC 101-1-20 Elementary Russian
